YQCSAw.en:
[Saint]
Oh~ How do you do~
I am Saint Gravity
from the planet called Gravity.
YQCSAw.pt:
[Saint]
Oh~ How do you do~
I am Saint Gravity
from the planet called Gravity.

YgCSAw.en:
[Saint]
The reason that I came here is
that people here is too light and
I can't withstand that.
So, I jumped to here~
YgCSAw.pt:
[Saint]
The reason that I came here is
that people here is too light and
I can't withstand that.
So, I jumped to here~

YwCSAw.en:
[Saint]
So~ You must be wondering how
I can make things heavier!
If you bring me '^FF0000Gym Membership Card^000000',
I will enchant the gravitation spell on you
to make your inventory increased by 200!
YwCSAw.pt:
[Saint]
So~ You must be wondering how
I can make things heavier!
If you bring me '^FF0000Gym Membership Card^000000',
I will enchant the gravitation spell on you
to make your inventory increased by 200!

ZACSAw.en:
[Saint]
But! You have to be careful.
People here are too weak
So~ they cannot be enchanted
more than ^FF000010 times^000000.
ZACSAw.pt:
[Saint]
But! You have to be careful.
People here are too weak
So~ they cannot be enchanted
more than ^FF000010 times^000000.

ZQCSAw.en:
[Saint]
Hey~ Would you like to be enchanted?
ZQCSAw.pt:
[Saint]
Hey~ Would you like to be enchanted?

aQCSAw.en:
[Saint]
Cool~ You really brought
'^FF0000Gym Membership Card^000000'~
You are brave~
You are strong~
aQCSAw.pt:
[Saint]
Cool~ You really brought
'^FF0000Gym Membership Card^000000'~
You are brave~
You are strong~

agCSAw.en:
[Saint]
I will enchant
the gravitation spell on you~
Hey~ You can expect it~
agCSAw.pt:
[Saint]
I will enchant
the gravitation spell on you~

awCSAw.en:
[Saint]
Oh~ now the gravitaion spell
is on you~
You~ are now strong~
Now~ you can be enchanted ^FF0000{}^000000
^FF0000{}^000000 times more~
awCSAw.pt:
[Saint]
Oh~ now the gravitaion spell
is on you~
You~ are now strong~

bACSAw.en:
[Saint]
Ah! If the magic is gone, come to me again~
Yet~ This magic is not adjusted for this climate.~
But, cause I can do it again, come to me gain when it has gone.~
bACSAw.pt:
[Saint]
Ah! If the magic is gone, come to me again~
Yet~ This magic is not adjusted for this climate.~
But, cause I can do it again, come to me gain when it has gone.~

bQCSAw.en:
[Saint]
Boo~ You do not have
'^FF0000Gym Membership Card^000000'!~
No membership, no magic~
bQCSAw.pt:
[Saint]
Boo~ You do not have
'^FF0000Gym Membership Card^000000'!~
No membership, no magic~

bgCSAw.en:
[Saint]
Oh~ You were enchanted
so many times~
You can be
enchanted no more!
Bye~ Good bye~
bgCSAw.pt:
[Saint]
Oh~ You were enchanted
so many times~
You can be
enchanted no more!
Bye~ Good bye~

bwCSAw.en:
[Saint]
Oh~ I am disapointed~
You are too weak.
bwCSAw.pt:
[Saint]
Oh~ I am disapointed~

cACSAw.en:
[Saint]
Ouh! It has gone!
It's the side effect~
But don't worry~
I will settle it down~
cACSAw.pt:
[Saint]

cQCSAw.en:
[Saint]

My spell is unstable but never fails~
Again~ Fee the magic again~
cQCSAw.pt:
